SEARCH
Package TheGraph

Class Graph<E>

java.lang.Object
TheGraph.Graph<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements stored in the vertices of the graph.
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuigiGraph, MarioGraph
public abstract class Graph<E> extends Object
Interface for a Graph data structure.

    • addVertex

      public abstract boolean addVertex(E obj)
      Adds a new vertex to the graph.
      Parameters:
      obj - the element to be stored in the new vertex and the key to be accesed.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addEdge

      Adds a new unweighted edge between two vertices in the graph.
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex.
      dest - the destination vertex.
      Returns:
      true if the edge was added successfully, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      dest - the destination vertex.
      weight - the weight of the edge.
      Returns:
      true if the edge was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeVertex

      public abstract boolean removeVertex(E obj)
      Removes a vertex and all its incident edges/arcs from the graph.
      Parameters:
      obj - the element stored (The key) in the vertex to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeArc

      public abstract boolean removeArc(E src, E dest)
      Removes a directed arc from the graph.
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the arc to be removed.
      dest - the destination vertex of the arc to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the arc was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeEdge

      public abstract boolean removeEdge(E src, E dest)
      Removes an undirected edge from the graph.
      Parameters:
      src - one of the vertices incident to the edge to be removed.
      dest - the other vertex incident to the edge to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the edge was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateArc

      public abstract boolean updateArc(E src, E dest, double weight)
      Updates the weight of a directed arc in the graph.
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the arc to be updated.
      dest - the destination vertex of the arc to be updated.
      weight - the new weight of the arc.
      Returns:
      true if the arc weight was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateEdge

      public abstract boolean updateEdge(E src, E dest, double weight)
      Updates the weight of an undirected edge in the graph.
      Parameters:
      src - one of the vertices incident to the edge to be updated.
      dest - the other vertex incident to the edge to be updated.
      weight - the new weight of the edge.
      Returns:
      true if the edge weight was updated successfully, false otherwise.
